Animation: [Level] Animation= AnimIndex, (KEY1_...), (KEY2_...), (FAN_...) flags, (ENV_...) Environment, Distance for Env, Extra, StateId (STATE_...) or (-)AnimationIndex (*Array*)
AnimationSlot: [Level] AnimationSlot= Slot, AnimSlotFlags (ASF_...), AnimIndex, (KEY1_...), (KEY2_...), (FAN_...) flags, (ENV_...) Environment, Distance for Env, Extra, StateId (STATE_...) or (-)AnimationIndex (*Array*)
Damage: [Level] Damage= Flags (DMG_...), SecondsForDeath, SecondsForBarRestore, BarColor, BarName, BlinkPercentage
DefaultWindowsFont: [Title] DefaultWindowsFont= IdWindowsFont, FLAGS (DWF_...), LineSpacing, MainMenuOffsets, NewGameTitle, LoadGameTitle, NewGameList, LoadGameList, OptionSettings, OptionCmdList, PauseScreen, StatList, InventoryItemName, ExamineText
Demo: [Level] Demo= DemoFlags (DEMF_...), Parameter, InfoText , DemoLegendText, WaitingTime, DemoIndex (*Array*)
Detector: [Level] Detector= Flags (DTF_...), MetricScale, MetersOfRange, Target Items (*Array*)
Diary: [Level] Diary= Id Diary, SlotDiaryItem, LaraDiaryFlags (LDF_...), BackGroundImageID, Default PageLayout (PL_...), FirstString, TitleWFontId, CommonTextWFontId
Elevator: [Level] Elevator= ElevatorIndex, ClickFloorDistance, NumberOfFloors, Elevator flags (EF_...), FirstDoorIndex, InnerKeyPadIndex, Speed, Frame items (*Array*)
Enemy: [Level] Enemy= Slot, HP (vitality), (NEF_...) flags, TombFlags (TCF_...), (EXTRA_...) flags, Damage1, Damage2, Damage3
GlobalTrigger: [Level] GlobalTrigger= IdGlobalTrigger, Flags Global Trigger (FGT_...), Global Trigger (GT_...), Parameter, IdConditionTriggerGroup, IdPerformTriggerGroup, IdOnFalseTriggerGroup
Image: [Level] Image= IdImageCommand, IdImageFile, ImageFlags (IF_...), EffectTime, AudioTrack, XPosition, YPosition, SizeX, SizeY
ItemGroup: [Level] ItemGroup= IdGroup, FirstIndexItem, {Other indices for items (*Array*)}
MirrorEffect: [Level] MirrorEffect= InFrontRoom, HiddenRoom, MirrorType (MIR_...), {Animating array + (FMIR_...) flags (*Array*)}
MultEnvCondition: [Level] MultEnvCondition= IdMultCondition, (ENV_...) condition, DistanceForEnv, Extra field, array of tripled of {(ENV_...) Condition, DistanceForEnv, Extra field}
Organizer: [Level] Organizer= IdOrganizer, Flags Organizer (FO_...), Parameter, FirstTime, PerformFirstIdTriggerGroup, SecondTime, PerformSecondIdTriggerGroup, {Time and TriggerGroup (*Array*)}
SavegamePanel: [Level] SavegamePanel= SavegamePanelFlags (SPF_...), BackGroundImageId, NumberOfSave, NumberOfVisibleSave, SavegamePanelLayout (SPL_...), InfoFormatString, IdListWindowsFont, IdInfoWindowsFont, InTitleWindowsFont
StandBy: [Level] StandBy= IdStandBY, Type StandBy (TSB_...), WaitTime, Flags StandBy (FSB_...), Text, NumTexts, AudioTrack, VAngle, RotateSpeed, Distance, IdTriggerGroupBegin, IdTriggerGroupEnd
StaticMIP: [Level] StaticMIP= MainStaticSlot, BStaticLimit, BStaticSlot, CStaticLimit, CStaticSlot
Switch: [Level] Switch= SwitchId, VariablePlaceFolder, FlagsSwitch (SWT_...), {Trigger Group Indices (*Array*)}
TestPosition: [Level] TestPosition= IdTestPosition, Flags (TPOS_...), Slot Moveable, XDistanceMin, XDistanceMax, YDistanceMin, YDistanceMax, ZDistanceMin, ZDistanceMax,  HOrientDiffMin, HOrientDiffMax, VOrientDiffMin, VOrientDiffMax, ROrientDiffMin, ROrientDiffMax
TriggerGroup: [Level] TriggerGroup= IdGroup, ExportValue1 + (TGROUP_...) flags, ExportValue2, ExportValue3, {Other Values 1/2/3 of exported triggers or conditions (*Array*)}
WindowsFont: [Level] WindowsFont= IdWindowFont, WindowFontName, WindowsFontFlags (WFF_...), SizeFont, ColorRbgId, ShadowColorRgbId
